definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Another painful affliction was boils, big and frequent.
sentences.chinese: 另一个折磨我的病痛是疖子，又大又频繁。

sentences.english: Some mist caused rashes and boils, others delirium and death.
sentences.chinese: 有些雾引起皮疹，疖子，有的精神错乱而死亡。

sentences.english: But the boil was gone, and all the poison was out of his system.
sentences.chinese: 但是疖子全没了，所有的毒都离开了他的身体。

sentences.english: The boil on your face has headed.
sentences.chinese: 你脸上的小疖子已经出脓头了。

sentences.english: Then you're going to die of boils.
You should see a doctor for that boil because it could be something very grave indeed.
sentences.chinese: 你应当去医院看看这个疖子，可能真的很严重呢。

sentences.english: Anyone who has had a boil knows how painful they are.
sentences.chinese: 长过疖子的人都知道那有多疼。

sentences.english: The boil on my arm has ripened.
sentences.chinese: 我胳臂上长的疖子已成熟可以去脓了。

sentences.english: The boil on my chest has matured.
The boil on my right arm rankled whenever I wrote.
sentences.chinese: 每当我写字的时候，右臂上的疖子就使我感到疼痛。

sentences.english: But a few days later, he got boils on his knees again.
sentences.chinese: 没几天，他的膝盖上又长了疖子。

definition: (of a sore etc) to fester/to ulcerate
tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
